00027 #include "kvi_settings.h"
00028 #include "kvi_kvs_script.h"
00029 #include "kvi_qstring.h"
00030 #include "kvi_kvs_moduleinterface.h"
00031 #include "kvi_heapobject.h"
00032 
00033 class KVIRC_API KviKvsEventHandler : public KviHeapObject
00034 {
00035 public:
00036         enum Type { Script , Module };
00037 protected:
00038         Type m_type;
00039 public:
00040         KviKvsEventHandler(Type t);
00041         virtual ~KviKvsEventHandler();
00042 public:
00043         Type type(){ return m_type; };
00044 };
00045 
00046 
00047 class KVIRC_API KviKvsScriptEventHandler : public KviKvsEventHandler
00048 {
00049 public:
00050         // the event handler becomes the owned of pszCode!
00051         KviKvsScriptEventHandler(const QString &szHandlerName,const QString &szContextName,const QString &szCode,bool bEnabled = true);
00052         virtual ~KviKvsScriptEventHandler();
00053 protected:
00054         QString        m_szName;
00055         KviKvsScript * m_pScript;
00056         bool           m_bEnabled;
00057 public:
00058         KviKvsScript * script(){ return m_pScript; };
00059         const QString & name(){ return m_szName; };
00060         const QString & code(){ return m_pScript->code(); };
00061 
00062         bool isEnabled(){ return m_bEnabled; };
00063         void setEnabled(bool bEnabled){ m_bEnabled = bEnabled; };
00064 
00065         // Static allocator function.
00066         // This MUST be used by the modules to allocate event structures
00067         // instead of the new operator.
00068         // See kvi_heapobject.cpp for an explaination.
00069         static KviKvsScriptEventHandler * createInstance(const QString &szHandlerName,const QString &szContextName,const QString &szCode,bool bEnabled = true);
00070 };

00073 class KVIRC_API KviKvsModuleEventHandler : public KviKvsEventHandler
00074 {
00075 protected:
00076         KviKvsModuleInterface           * m_pModule;
00077         KviKvsModuleEventHandlerRoutine * m_pProc;
00078 public:
00079         KviKvsModuleEventHandler(KviKvsModuleInterface * m,KviKvsModuleEventHandlerRoutine proc);
00080         virtual ~KviKvsModuleEventHandler();
00081 public:
00082         KviKvsModuleInterface * moduleInterface(){ return m_pModule; };
00083         KviKvsModuleEventHandlerRoutine * handlerRoutine(){ return m_pProc; };
00084 };
